abstract: The defense contractor General Dynamics said it planned to buy Axsys Technologies, a maker of surveillance and imaging systems, for $643 million.
snippet: The defense contractor General Dynamics said it planned to buy Axsys Technologies, a maker of surveillance and imaging systems, for $643 million.
lead_paragraph: The defense contractor General Dynamics, looking to position itself for new business as American military forces shift priorities, announced Thursday that it planned to buy Axsys Technologies, a maker of surveillance and imaging systems, for $643 million, Reuters reported.

headline.main: General Dynamics to Buy Axsys for $643 Million
